option.value:
package ort.argentina.yatay.tp3.tp3_parcial_grupal3.ui.viewmodel
/** * ApiViewModel - DESHABILITADO * * Este ViewModel era un ejemplo que usaba JSONPlaceholder. * Las operaciones de API de autenticación están en AuthViewModel. */

option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- App Name --> <string name="app_name">TP3 Parcial Grupal</string>
<!-- Launch Screen --> <string name="launch_loading">Loading…</string>
<!-- OnBoarding Screen --> <string name="onboarding_title">Welcome</string> <string name="onboarding_skip">Skip</string> <string name="onboarding_next">Next</string> <string name="onboarding_get_started">Start</string>
<!-- Login Screen --> <string name="login_title">Log In</string> <string name="login_email">Email</string> <string name="login_password">Password</string> <string name="login_button">Sign in</string> <string name="login_forgot_password">Forgot your password\?</string> <string name="login_signup">You don\'t have an account\? Sign up</string>
<!-- Home Screen - Balance Section --> <string name="balance_title">Total Balance</string> <string name="expense_title">Total Expense</string> <string name="expenses_status">30% Of Your Expenses, Looks Good.</string>
<!-- Home Screen - Header --> <string name="home_greeting">Hi, Welcome Back</string> <string name="home_good_morning">Good Morning</string>
<!-- Home Screen - Savings Card --> <string name="savings_title">Savings\nOn Goals</string> <string name="revenue_last_week">Revenue Last Week</string> <string name="food_last_week">Food Last Week</string>
<!-- Home Screen - Period Selector --> <string name="period_daily">Daily</string> <string name="period_weekly">Weekly</string> <string name="period_monthly">Monthly</string>
<!-- Home Screen - Transactions --> <string name="transaction_salary">Salary</string> <string name="transaction_groceries">Groceries</string> <string name="transaction_rent">Rent</string>
<!-- Sign Up Screen --> <string name="signup_title">Sign Up</string> <string name="signup_name">Full name</string> <string name="signup_email">Email</string> <string name="signup_password">Password</string> <string name="signup_confirm_password">Confirm password</string> <string name="signup_button">Sign up</string> <string name="signup_login">Do you have an account? Sign in</string>
<!-- Forgot Password Screen --> <string name="forgot_password_title">Recover password</string> <string name="forgot_password_description">Write your mail to recover password</string> <string name="forgot_password_email">Email</string> <string name="forgot_password_button">Send</string> <string name="forgot_password_back">Back</string>
<!-- Home Screen --> <string name="home_title">Start</string> <string name="home_welcome">Welcome</string>
<!-- Account Balance Screen --> <string name="balance_available">Balance available</string> <string name="balance_total">Balance total</string>
<!-- Transaction Screen --> <string name="transaction_title">Transactions</string> <string name="transaction_new">New transaction</string> <string name="transaction_history">History</string>
<!-- Categories Screen --> <string name="categories_title">Categories</string> <string name="categories_add">Add category</string>
<!-- Profile Screen --> <string name="profile_title">Profile</string> <string name="profile_edit">Edit profile</string> <string name="profile_logout">Close session</string>
<!-- Notifications --> <string name="notifications_title">Notifications</string> <string name="notifications_empty">You don\'t have any notifications</string> <string name="notifications_mark_read">Mark as read</string>
<!-- Common --> <string name="common_cancel">Cancel</string> <string name="common_save">Save</string> <string name="common_delete">Remove</string> <string name="common_edit">Edit</string> <string name="common_confirm">Confirm</string> <string name="common_error">Error</string> <string name="common_success">Success</string> <string name="common_loading">Loading…</string>
<string name="app_name_finwise">FinWise</string> <string name="welcome_description">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod.</string> <string name="username_or_email">Username Or Email</string> <string name="mobile_number">Mobile Number</string> <string name="date_of_birth">Date of Birth</string> <string name="confirm_password">Confirm Password</string> <string name="use_fingerprint">Use Fingerprint To Access</string> <string name="dont_have_account">Don\'t have an account? Sign Up</string> <string name="already_have_account">Already have an account? Log In</string> <string name="terms_privacy">By continuing, you agree to Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.</string> <string name="reset_password">Reset Password?</string> <string name="enter_email_address">Enter Email Address</string> <string name="next_step">Next Step</string> <string name="security_pin">Security Pin</string> <string name="enter_security_pin">Enter Security Pin</string> <string name="accept">Accept</string> <string name="send_again">Send Again</string> <string name="new_password">New Password</string> <string name="confirm_new_password">Confirm New Password</string> <string name="change_password">Change Password</string> <string name="password_changed_successfully">Password Has Been Changed Successfully</string> </resources>
